net.codemusic.smartears
Class SmartEars

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--net.codemusic.smartears.SmartEars
All Implemented Interfaces:
IController
public class SmartEars
extends java.lang.Object
implements IController

This class serves as a Controller for this application in that it connects the model classes with the view classes. It creates and connects the model classes and allows the GUI to access the necessary model elements.
